cards.question: What was your Goal? Phrase it in one sentence.
deepeningQuestions: Did anyone have a different Goal?

cards.question: What would you have liked to have known beforehand?
deepeningQuestions: What stopped you from getting it?

cards.question: How did you align on the Goal?
deepeningQuestions: Doing it again, how would you align differently?

cards.question: Was there a shared understanding of the Goal?
deepeningQuestions: How did you reach the shared understanding?
Would a shared understanding have helped?

cards.question: How is your understanding of the Goal different now?
deepeningQuestions: How would the experience change, if you knew this beforehand?

cards.question: How did you start?
deepeningQuestions: Did you have to stop and restart?

cards.question: What was most challenging?
deepeningQuestions: Who in the room was best equipped to meet this challenge?
What did this experience teach you about your day-to-day?

cards.question: What steps were taken?
deepeningQuestions: Which led to learning or improvement?

cards.question: Did you assume anything that turned out to be wrong?
What was the defining moment that changed things?
How could you have made the Process more/less pleasant?
deepeningQuestions: What would you have done differently?
How would this have changed the experience?
Would there have been a different result?

cards.question: What decisions did you make?
deepeningQuestions: Why did you need to decide?
Was it a good or bad decision?

cards.question: What ideas, innovation or changes emerged?
What reminded you of your day-to-day?
deepeningQuestions: What did this experience teach you?

cards.question: How did you organize yourselves?
Did something unpredictable happen?
deepeningQuestions: Did you want to control/avoid this?

cards.question: What changes in GroupDynamics did you experience?
deepeningQuestions: How did this impact your experience?
Was everybody aware of this change?

cards.question: How was the participation distributed?
How could you have worked together better?
deepeningQuestions: When did you realize this was an option?

cards.question: What interesting behaviours did you observe?
deepeningQuestions: Why was this interesting to you?

cards.question: Where have you encountered similar behaviours?
deepeningQuestions: What did this experience teach you about your day-to-day?

cards.question: What didnâ€™t you say, that you wish you had?
deepeningQuestions: What stopped you from saying it?
What would have been different if said?
What question would you have liked to ask yourself/the team?

cards.question: What non-verbal Communication was there?
deepeningQuestions: What was the impact on you and the group?
Could others have interpreted this differently?

cards.question: What did this teach you about great communication?
deepeningQuestions: How would you teach this to others?
List your top five Communication take-aways!

cards.question: What misCommunications were there?
deepeningQuestions: How did this impact the experience?
How could you have communicated better?

cards.question: Did you communicate enough?
deepeningQuestions: How would more/less communication have impacted your experience?
Did anything stop you from communicating more or less?

cards.question: Doing it again, how would you communicate differently?
deepeningQuestions: What would be the impact on you/others?
What would have helped you realise?

cards.question: What is left unspoken?
deepeningQuestions: Would speaking about it have helped?
What did this experience teach you about your day-to-day?

cards.question: How did you feel?
deepeningQuestions: Were others aware that you felt that way?

cards.question: What was this experience like?
deepeningQuestions: What about it made it like this?
What would be a good comparison?

cards.question: How did you deal with your emotions?
deepeningQuestions: Has this happened to you before?

cards.question: What did you like or dislike about the experience?
Where have you observed similar emotions and behaviours?
When did you care most/least about the outcome?
deepeningQuestions: Did anybody feel the same way?
How strongly did you feel about it?

cards.question: What else would you like to share?
deepeningQuestions: What did you learn about other people's emotions?
What did this experience teach you about your day-to-day?

cards.question: What does this experience remind you of in your day-to-day?
deepeningQuestions: What insights does this give you?

cards.question: What did you learn about yourself and the team?
deepeningQuestions: What would you share with others?
Phrase it as a slogan or motto!

cards.question: What did you do that will be beneficial in your day-to-day life?
deepeningQuestions: What would you like to happen?
What first steps could you take?
How would you know that you are succeeding?

cards.question: What are you more aware of now?
deepeningQuestions: How will you remember this tomorrow?
How will you use this inspiration to help you or your team?

cards.question: What are the top 5 things you will take away?
deepeningQuestions: What are you going to do with them?
How will you share with others?

cards.question: If you had a magic wand what one thing would you change?
What would an expert make of your experience?
deepeningQuestions: How would the expert summarize it in five words?
What did this experience teach you about your day-to-day?
